00076                 miUlong* const ID = NULL);
00077

00079                        miScalar* const F, miVector* const delta = NULL,
00080                        miUlong* const ID = NULL)
00081      {
00082         return noise(P.x, P.y, P.z, max_order, F, delta, ID);
00083      }
00084      
00085      static MR_LIB_EXPORT
00086      void noise(const mr::distances::Type& DistanceMeasure,
00087                 const miVector& scale,
00088                 const miScalar x, const miScalar y,
00089                 const miScalar z, const miUlong max_order,
00090                 miScalar* const F, miVector* const delta = NULL,
00091                 miUlong* const ID = NULL);
00092      
00093      static void noise(const mr::distances::Type& DistanceMeasure,
00094                        const miVector& scale,
00095                        const miVector& P, const miUlong max_order,
00096                        miScalar* const F, miVector* const delta = NULL,
00097                        miUlong* const ID = NULL)
00098      {
00099         return noise(DistanceMeasure, scale, P.x, P.y, P.z,
00100                      max_order, F, delta, ID);
